name: Novice Barbarian
description: A novice barbarian, skilled in the art of melee combat and survival.

name: Novice Paladin
description: A novice paladin, skilled in the art of swordsmanship and magic.

name: Novice Archer
description: A novice archer, skilled in the art of archery and ranged combat.

name: Novice Mage
description: A novice mage, skilled in the art of magic and spellcasting.

name: Berseker
description: A berseker is a fierce warrior known for their brute strength and ferocity.

name: Knight
description: A knight is a holy warrior who fights for justice and righteousness.

name: Ranger
description: A ranger is a skilled marksman who excels at ranged combat.

name: Magician
description: A magician is a master of elemental magic, capable of casting powerful spells.

name: Warlord
description: A warlord is a powerful warrior who leads their allies into battle.

name: Crusader
description: A crusader is a holy knight who fights for justice and righteousness.

name: Sharpshooter
description: A sharpshooter is a master of ranged combat, capable of hitting targets from great distances.

name: Wizard
description: A wizard is a master of elemental magic, capable of casting powerful spells.
